chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info: Great Lord of the Dark, p. xii—Name used by Darkfriends to refer to Shai'tan, the Dark One; they claim that to use his true name would be blasphemy. See Shai'tan.

chapters.title: Chapter 32: Four Kings in Shadow
chapters.info: Great Lord of the Dark, p. 406—Name used by Darkfriends for the Dark One, claiming that to use his true name would be blasphemy. See Shai'tan.
